word:
I entreat all who shall read or hear these words to be instant in season and out of season. Believe God, but do not without question sanction everything that claims to come from God. There will be many voices saying, Here is Christ, here is truth. Watch carefully, guard every point, lest you be taken unawares.--Letter 4, 1893. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. January 3, 1985 Entire Letter
